original_text: And it came to pass on the third day in the morning, that there were thunders and lightnings, and a thick cloud upon the mount, and the voice of the trumpet exceeding loud; so that all the people that was in the camp trembled.
korean_text: 셋째 날 아침에 우레와 번개와 빽빽한 구름이 산 위에 있고 나팔 소리가 매우 크게 들리니 진중에 있는 모든 백성이 다 떨더라

sentences.original_text: on the third day in the morning
that there were thunders and lightnings
and a thick cloud upon the mount
and the voice of the trumpet exceeding loud
so that all the people that was in the camp trembled
sentences.korean_translation: 진 중에 있는 모든 백성이 떨었더라
